title: Foundation: A/L in Physical Science
description: Complete your G.C.E. A/L in the Physical Science (Maths) stream. A strong foundation in Combined Mathematics and Physics is crucial for understanding the core concepts of data science.

title: Bachelor's Degree in a Quantitative Field
description: Obtain a BSc degree in Computer Science, Statistics, IT with specialization in Data Science, or a related field. This academic step is essential for learning programming, algorithms, and statistical theory.

title: Entry-Level Role: Data Analyst
description: Begin your career as a Data Analyst. In this role, you will work with data sets to identify trends, create reports, and develop visualizations to help businesses make informed decisions. This is practical training for a full data scientist role.

title: Transition to Data Scientist
description: Leverage your analyst experience to move into a Data Scientist position. This role involves more advanced tasks like building predictive models, using machine learning algorithms, and conducting in-depth exploratory analysis.
qualifications: Proven experience as a Data Analyst

title: Senior Data Scientist / ML Engineer
description: Advance to a senior role where you lead complex data science projects, mentor junior team members, and contribute to data strategy. You can specialize further into fields like Machine Learning Engineering or AI Research. A Master's degree can accelerate this step.
qualifications: MSc in Data Science/AI (Optional but recommended)
institutes: Leading tech companies and research divisions
